participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ra_scan_cl_prescr_order.Description: Prescribed task/trial order | This field references the task and trial order values displayed in "Special Instrument Participation".

ra_scan_cl_non_rand.Description: A non-prescribed task and/or trial order was used for this scan. | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

ra_scan_cl_task_ord_used.Description: fMRI task order used instead | 1 = 1 (SST -> MID -> NBACK); 2 = 2 (SST ->NBACK -> MID); 3 = 3 (MID -> SST -> NBACK); 4 = 4 (MID -> NBACK -> SST); 5 = 5 (NBACK -> MID -> SST); 6 = 6 (NBACK -> SST -> MID)

ra_scan_cl_trial_ord_nback.Description: fMRI trial order N-BACK used instead | 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4

ra_scan_check_list_mido.Description: MID task order | 1 = 1st task; 2 = 2nd task; 3 = 3rd task

ra_scan_check_list_vmidrc.Description: Version of MID | 1 = A; 2 = B; 3 = C

ra_scan_check_list_emoo.Description: Emo Nback task order | 1 = 1st task; 2 = 2nd task; 3 = 3rd task

ra_scan_check_list_ssto.Description: SST task order | 1 = 1st task; 2 = 2nd task; 3 = 3rd task

ra_scan_check_list_sspc.Description: Number of Scanning Sessions for Child | 0 = 0 ; 1 = 1 ; 2 = 2

ra_scan_check_list_rcom.Description: How many runs completed for MID? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2

ra_scan_cl_mid_scan_lap.Description: Was the MID task run in the scanner or laptop? | 1 = Scanner; 2 = Laptop; 3 = Scanner and Laptop; 0 = Did not complete either

ra_scan_check_mid_earn.Description: How much money did the participant earn during the MID task?

ra_scan_check_list_vemorc.Description: How many runs completed for Emo NBack? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2

ra_scan_cl_nbac_scan_lap.Description: Was the N-BACK task run in the scanner or laptop? | 1 = Scanner; 2 = Laptop; 3 = Scanner and Laptop; 0 = Did not complete either

ra_scan_check_list_sstrc.Description: How many runs completed for SST? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2

ra_scan_cl_sst_scan_lap.Description: Was the SST task run in the scanner or laptop? | 1 = Scanner; 2 = Laptop; 3 = Scanner and Laptop; 0 = Did not complete either
